statements: SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp, engagement_score FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_score > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp, engagement_score FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 100 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(interaction_duration) AS max_duration FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC, interaction_duration
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) AND interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(engagement_score) > 8 ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY date
SELECT interaction_type, SUM(interaction_duration) AS total_duration FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-03-15' GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT course_name, instructor, created_at FROM courses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as num_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interactions > 5;
SELECT course_id, instructor, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, created_at, updated_at) as duration FROM courses;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT course_name, instructor, created_at FROM courses WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, course_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT course_id, average_engagement, completion_rate FROM engagement_metrics WHERE average_engagement > 75;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, description FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ui.timestamp, em.average_engagement FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN courses c ON ui.course_id = c.course_id JOIN engagement_metrics em ON c.course_id = em.course_id WHERE em.completion_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY ui.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions JOIN courses ON user_interactions.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE user_interactions.interaction_type = 'viewed' AND courses.instructor_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ui.timestamp, em.average_engagement FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN courses c ON ui.course_id = c.course_id JOIN engagement_metrics em ON c.course_id = em.course_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' OR c.course_name LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY ui.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_content FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM user_details WHERE username LIKE 'John%'
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM course_details ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, c.course_name FROM user_details u INNER JOIN course_details c ON u.user_id = c.course_id

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, e.assignments_completed FROM user_details u INNER JOIN course_details c ON u.user_id = c.course_id INNER JOIN engagement_metrics e ON u.user_id = e.user_id AND c.course_id = e.course_id

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, em.time_on_course FROM user_details u, course_details c, engagement_metrics em WHERE u.user_id = em.user_id AND c.course_id = em.course_id ORDER BY em.time_on_course DESC
